AmountType.title: AmountType
AmountType.description: An amount is anumber of monetary units specified in a currency.

BinaryObjectType.title: BinaryObjectType
BinaryObjectType.description: A binary object is a sequence of binary digits(bits).

CodeType.title: CodeType
CodeType.description: A code is a character string of letters, numbers, special characters (except escape sequences), and symbols. It represents a definitive value, a method, or a property description in an abbreviated or language-independent form that is part of a finite list of allowed values.

DurationType.title: DurationType
DurationType.description: A duration is the specification of a length of time without a fixed start or end time.

IdentifierType.title: IdentifierType
IdentifierType.description: A character string to identify and distinguish uniquely, one instance of an object in an identification scheme from all other objects in the same scheme together with relevant supplementary information.

IndicatorType.title: IndicatorType
IndicatorType.description: An indicator is a list of two mutually exclusive boolean values that express the only possible states of a property.

MeasureType.title: MeasureType
MeasureType.description: A measure is a numeric value determined by measuring an object along with the specified unit of measure.

NameType.title: NameType
NameType.description: A name is a word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a person, place, thing or concept.

NumberType.title: NumberType
NumberType.description: A mathematical number that is assigned or is determined by calculation.

OrdinalType.title: OrdinalType
OrdinalType.description: An ordinal number is an assigned mathematical number that represents order or sequence.

PercentType.title: PercentType
PercentType.description: A percent is a value representing a fraction of one hundred, expressed as a quotient.

QuantityType.title: QuantityType
QuantityType.description: A quantity is a counted number of non-monetary units, possibly including fractions.

RateType.title: RateType
RateType.description: Used to represent the numerical quotient resulting from a comparison of two independent things such as a quantity measured with respect to another measured quantity.

RatioType.title: RatioType
RatioType.description: NOTES: Do we really need this or just use number

TextType.title: TextType
TextType.description: Text is a character string such as a finite set of characters generally in the form of words of a language. NOTES: Creates nesting, where we can do better. If we decide to keep at least should not enforce its usage

FormattedDateTimeType.title: FormattedDateTimeType
FormattedDateTimeType.description: This is formatted representation of a date, which may be specified as a date, date/time, year, or year/month.

PeriodType.title: PeriodType
PeriodType.description: Single date/timespan/month/year or period between two dates/months/years.

EntityType.title: EntityType
EntityType.description: Describe entity with id, name and code

id.description: Recommended usage: unique descriptor which can't be expressed as enumeration

name.description: Recommended usage: free text description for that entity

code.description: Recommended usage: descriptor which can be expressed as enumeration

Localization.title: Localization
Localization.description: Can be used for any entity to specify localization language code

EffectiveTimePeriod.title: EffectiveTimePeriod
EffectiveTimePeriod.description: A time period in which an associated object is effective.
